sentences.en: A hydrocarbon was known to be either an alkene or alkane.
sentences.cn: 某碳氢化合物已知可能是烯烃或是烷烃.

sentences.en: A typical example is the halogenation of a hydrocarbon.
sentences.cn: 典型的例子是碳氢化合物的卤化.

sentences.en: As one of substitutes for fire-extinguishing agent of halogenated hydrocarbon, fire-extinguishing agent of halogenated hydrocarbon produces lots of acid gases.
sentences.cn: 作为哈龙灭火剂气体替代物之一的卤代烃类灭火剂用于灭火时会产生大量的卤化氢酸性气体。

sentences.en: AVO cross plot technique is an important analysis tool of hydrocarbon detection.
sentences.cn: AVO交汇 图分析技术是AVO碳氢检测技术的一种重要分析手段.

sentences.en: Compound M is a gaseous hydrocarbon and on combustion yields carbon dioxide and water.
sentences.cn: 化合物M是一种气态的烃,燃烧时生成二氧化碳和水.

sentences.en: During incomplete combustion some of the hydrocarbon fuel is cracked.
sentences.cn: 在不完全的燃烧中,一些烃燃料裂解.

sentences.en: Explorationists in general and geophysicists in particular search for hydrocarbon traps.
sentences.cn: 绝大部分勘探家和部分地球物理学家寻找的是烃类圈闭.

sentences.en: Hetaoyuan Formation in Nanyang Depression is a major hydrocarbon containing target zone.
sentences.cn: 摘要南阳凹陷核桃园组是主要含油目的层.

sentences.en: Limitedly resistant to aromatic hydrocarbon, strong solvent, acids and oxide materials.
sentences.cn: 本品对芳烃 、 强溶剂 、 酸和氧化材料的耐度有限.

sentences.en: Magnetism and hydrocarbon content of shallow soil show interrelated characteristics.
sentences.cn: 浅层土壤的磁性与烃含量之间呈明显的相关特征.

sentences.en: Study on the levels of volatile halogenerated hydrocarbon in drinking Linyi City.
sentences.cn: 饮用水;挥发性卤代烃;氯仿;四氯化碳.

sentences.en: The benzenoid hydrocarbon are all nonclassical and, thus potentially aromatic.
sentences.cn: 苯环型烃都是非经典烃, 因此,可能是芳香烃.

sentences.en: The hydrocarbon content of this phosphate ore provides most of the heat needed for the calcination.
sentences.cn: 这磷矿所含烃量能提供锻烧所需的大部分热量.

sentences.en: The hydrocarbon diperchlorate products have utility as detonatable sensitizers for explosives and alkylating agents.
sentences.cn: 二过氯酸烃基酯产物可用作起爆药的敏化剂及作为烷化剂.

sentences.en: The hydrocarbon must be an alkene.
sentences.cn: 这个碳氢化合物必定是烯烃.

sentences.en: The petroleum hydrocarbon is called hexane.
sentences.cn: 己烷是一种石油碳氢化合物.

sentences.en: There are several chemical processes that can change one hydrocarbon into another.
sentences.cn: 几个化攻过程就可以将一种碳氢化合物变成另一种。

words.tran_cn: [油气] 加氢裂化；氢化裂解
与水化合；成水合物（hydrate的过去分词形式）
[油气] 加氢裂化（hydrocrack的ing形式）；氢化裂解

phrases.tran_cn: n. 碳氢燃料；烃类燃料

trans.tran_en: a chemical compound that consists of  hydrogen and carbon, such as coal or gas
